changeSet.createView: SELECT VP.variablefeature_id, F.feature_id, variable_name, comid, lid, gage_id, region, state, huc, feature_name, latitude, longitude, V.variable_id FROM wres.VariableFeature VP INNER JOIN wres.Variable V ON V.variable_id = VP.variable_id INNER JOIN wres.Feature F ON F.feature_id = VP.feature_id;
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE wres.VariableByFeature OWNER TO wres;
changeSet.comment: The wres.VariableByFeature view has been added to the database.
